channel.title: environment on Chris Mony
channel.description: Recent content in environment on Chris Mony

item.title: Social impact as two-way street
item.description: Photo by C D-X on Unsplash Have you ever thought about how much of your life is influenced by others? Or how much of an impact you might have on other people’s lives? If you are like me, potentially not enough. Most of the time, I am quite absorbed in my own existence. How do I solve this problem for work, when am I going to eat, does he/she like me, are all not unfamiliar thoughts rumoring in my mind.

item.title: About the practical application of values
item.description: My value wall. I blurred the details since some texts are quite personal. If you want to know how I define a specific value, simply ask me;) However, if you are really interested in my style of formulating them, I included the template for two banners (including text) at the bottom. While I was bike touring last year, I happened to stumble (i.e., pedal :D) into the beautiful city of Stockholm.
